extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • MusicPlayer

        public MusicPlayer()
            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                   java.io.IOException,
                   FolderWithoutMP3ContentException
        Constructor MusicPlayer method that starts the entire current song metadata and the media player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class definition is not there due to the library witch contains it is not in the application class path.
        java.io.IOException - if the file has not been found, deleted or moved to another location.
        FolderWithoutMP3ContentException - if the selected folder does not have music files with mp3 extension.

      • loadMusicFolders

        private void loadMusicFolders(java.io.File mf)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Method that deserializes the folder with music when the application is started again.
        Parameters:
        mf - A File that represents the first music folder in the linked list to deserialize when the application is started again
        mf != null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file has not been found, deleted or moved to another location.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class definition is not there due to the library witch contains it is not in the application class path.

      • addMusicFolder

        public void addMusicFolder(java.io.File dir)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           FolderWithoutMP3ContentException
        This method allows to add a music folder into the linked list of music folders in the last place.
        Parameters:
        dir - A File that represents the music folder to be added in the linked list of music folders.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file has not been found, deleted or moved to another location.
        FolderWithoutMP3ContentException - if the selected folder does not have music files with mp3 extension.

        Returns:
        An ObservableList of MusicFolders that represents the linked list to display it in the interface.

      • removeMusicFolderFromLibraries

        public void removeMusicFolderFromLibraries(MusicFolder toremove)
                                    throws AttemptedToRemoveDemoLibraryException,
                                           AttemptedToRemoveCurrentPlayListException
        This method allows to remove a music folder from the linked list.
        Parameters:
        toremove - A MusicFolder that represents the music folder that will be removed from the linked list
        toremove != null
        Throws:
        AttemptedToRemoveDemoLibraryException - if the user tries to remove the default music folder.
        AttemptedToRemoveCurrentPlayListException

                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method allows to save the songs played register when the application is closed.
